casebody.data:
KING
v.
ALBEMARLE HOSPITAL AUTHORITY, et al. 382PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2017 Amberley G. Hammer, Attorney at Law, for King, Desiree, et al. Wayne M. Mansulla, Attorney at Law, for D.K. (Minor), et al. Samuel G. Thompson, Attorney at Law, Robert E. Desmond, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Northeastern OB/GYN, LTD, et al. Charles E. Simpson, Jr., Attorney at Law, Jay C. Salsman, Attorney at Law, New Bern, for Albemarle Hospital Authority, et al. Ann C. Ochsner, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Adam Stein, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for N.C. Advocates for Justice.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of June 2017 by North Carolina Advocates for Justice for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of June 2017."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
